content:
roboto_heks_font_for_heksiNglish_600_470.jpg kaindli provaid hlp tu mek changes in lexer/parser phur roboto_heks_jk phonts. iph progrqmr raits program in heksifglish rust it shud kmpail.
https://gitlab.com/heksadesiml/hpop/-/tree/master/app/src/main/res/font

vn_1) https://gitlab.com/heksadesiml/heksip
tu_2) https://gitlab.com/heksadesiml/hpop

Please use English here. Most people (include me) don't understand what you write.
Also, what does it mean and does it relate to compiler things?

Translation by google from Hindi:

Candily provided slap too make changes in Lexer / Purser fur robot_hex_jack fonts. If program rights rights in hexifragalis based net compile.

I am pretty sure vntivnso heksadesiml got confused with some other place.

I want compiler to replace "while" keyword with "vhile". kindly help vhere in sors kod klon https://gitlab.com/heksadesiml/heksip change should be done.

I want to make rust compiler for heksi_kod instead of ascii. in heksi_kod ". kaindli see image in above repositry link.

:laughing: I love it. Though please refrain from writing heksi_kod text here in zulip. I understand that your project uses it, but in order to have a reasonable conversation, let's stay in ascii for the conversation, even when talking about heksifglish.

"rait a poem in skots. (it is important not to be vorried about spelling in dis – rait as you hear sounds in your head.)"

  1. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scots_language
  2. https://gitlab.com/heksadesiml/heksip
I understand, I can read it easily, but please refrain from writing more of it on zulip
Communication is hard enough between people from different backgrounds and mother languages, let's keep with the canonical american or british spelling

I think all you need to do is touch the symbol table (https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/46cf80dc1a75ad27f67e79f73fec371a16762494/src/librustc_span/symbol.rs#L69) and things should mostly just work out

ascii_5_10 ( 5X2=10) ===> heksi_8_10 (8X2=10)
rust_5_10 ( 5X2=10) ===> rust_8_10 (8X2=10)
i need help for use case : if programer writes below line in rust_8_10

let list1 A [i20B :] = [?, ?, ?,?, ?, ?,?,?, ?,?]; // rust_8_10 rust_8_10.png
/* should create list1 same as below line creates after compiling. */
let list1 : [i32; 10] = [0xf, 0xf , 0xf, 0xf, 0xf, 0xf, 0xf, 0xf, 0xf, 0xf]; // rust_5_10

so how to accomplish this change . please help for this scenario.
(I've moved your message back into the original topic to keep things together)
you want to replace : with A?
and ? with 0xf?
and : means 10?
this is not going to work with the existing parser unless you also change how you encode the ? operator
also the lexer can't handle i20B as anything but a single identifier
I don't think you can do this without a rewrite of the lexer

ascii_5_10(5X2=10) -> heksi_8_10(8X2=10)
rust_5_10(5X2=10) -> rust_8_10(8X2=10)
English -> C++ , skots -> si++
gitlab.com/heksadesiml/hpop
kiibord_heksifglish1.jpg rust_8_10.png
I don't know what you are trying to say or ask. Please keep posting in the same thread and write some text instead of just pictures and some code

iph ve use only small case phur rustc programing then ve vill get more programing symbols phur modern programing rekuirements - templates html object oriented & si++ operations:

  1. not ekual to
  2. is ekual to
  3. ">>" "<<" "->" etc ....
    . kiibord_heksifglish1.jpg
    rust_8_10.png
    [hscii phonts] (https://github.com/Font77/hpop/tree/master/app/src/main/res/font)

@vntivnso heksadesiml You've been asked, repeatedly, to post in English. Please keep the constructed language (or deconstructed language, as the case may be) to your own servers and spaces, and don't keep trying to get people here to decode it.
pls keyp þe funetic speling to urslf & peepl vho vant 2 C & spk it.
(And, that line aside, that does not include me, either.)
Rust, in general, has plenty of appreciation for humor, but not for inflicting that humor on people who aren't looking to participate in it.
Please do not post any further phonetic-spelling posts, decoding instructions/images, etc.
